NezumiInteraction1: ^I'm glad to see you're finally awake, you had me worried there. Do you want to tell me what happened, son?

c-0: ^And were on a boat headed for Mouse Point. Wait, who are you?
c-1: ^III..was with mmmy parents..we were hhheaded for Mouse Point..where are they? Who are you?
c-2: ^I almost drowned on the way to some place called Mouse Point. What’s it to you?

Dovetail: ^Hmm..Mouse Point.. I see. Oh, that reminds me I think you dropped this. It washed up on shore not long after you did.
^Ya know, funny thing about that sword is that I’d recognize it anywhere. That’s Linus Mowsten’s sword. Which means,that you’re Darwin, right?
^He was a cherished friend. Look Darwin, I want to help you get back to your family. It’s the least I could do for Linus.

c-0: ^Now that I’ve got my grandpa’s sword back I’ll be on my way.
c-1: ^My mom and dad will come for me. I’ll stay here until they do.
c-2: ^I have no way of knowing if what you are telling me is true.

Dovetail2: ^Well the fact is that it’s dangerous outside of Totten Town. And if you are to leave here, you’ll need to be prepared. When you’re ready, go and seek out Funé. You’ll likely find him outside practicing his katas.
